                                  float widthScale,
                                  float heightScale,
                                  Map<RenderingHints.Key,​Object> hints)
        Scales a specified image using plain calls to Graphics2D and AffineTransform.

        Not best quality when scaling down.

        Parameters:
        inputImage - the image to scale
        widthScale - width scale factor
        heightScale - height scale factor
        hints - rendering hints
        Returns:
        the scaled image
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_RENDERING_HINTS
